* Increase resolution of the hits. For better accuracy readings.

title: Final timing tweak

Final timing tweak

SCREW TIMING.

title: revert swipe implementation to the original one
message:
revert swipe implementation to the original one

* Trigger swipe when exiting the tap zone instead of using smaller
boundaries. This should allow slower processing of the 'dragged' action
to be registered allowing fast swipes to trigger.
* Prevent a lane-lock on early hold release

title: Bug fixes
message:
Bug fixes

RC 1.4
* make sure funny stuff doesn't happen again...
* Sort notes by time, instead of ID, as some notes may have wonky IDs.

title: Improvements and tweaks
message:
Improvements and tweaks

* Change fonts for song selection and result screen - previous font was
missing characters
* Remove the overbloated jp-font file to reduce the final size of the
app
* Use lightweight fonts for titles and combo
* Timing tweaks to swipes and holds
* Increase the size of the combo marker
* Add sorting order option to the settings screen

message: Revert timing fix

title: Changers to swipes
message:
Changers to swipes

* Swipes will now count if you cross the center of the swipe instead of
having to exit the circle completely
* Fine tuning to timing

title: More tweaks
message:
More tweaks

*Reduce the timing window of the slides/holds slightly
* Register taps if they happen on the lower half of the screen.

title: Timing tweaks
message:
Timing tweaks

* Swipes and holds have a generous timing window (2x  tap window)
* More tweaking to the standard tap window
* Display the on-release accuracy marker which was missing.
